basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi there! I'm a aspiring data scientist with a strong background in computer programming, as well as a thorough understanding of data science and machine learning. Throughout my education, I have gained experience in programming languages such as Python, javascript, c++, etc and have worked on projects involving statistical modeling, predictive analytics, and data visualization. I am highly motivated to continue expanding my knowledge and skills in these areas, and to apply them to real-world problems. My passion for data science is rooted in the belief that data has the power to drive innovation and create positive change. I am excited to leverage my skills and experience to help organizations make data-driven decisions and achieve their goals.

projects.title: Virtual Drag and Drop
projects.description: I had a lot of fun working on this project and got to learn a lot of new features with computer vision. and learned basic tensorflow implementations

projects.title: Jetpack Compose Graphing library
projects.description: Personal project for others to use, I realized jetpack compose does not have a library for charts/graphs so I decided to use my framework knowledge to make one.

projects.title: Logistics Invoice Application
projects.description: For this project I developed an invoicing system for a logistics company, which calculates the final pay for each driver and uses google maps api for distance trakcing.

notebooks.title: Shinkansen travel experience
notebooks.description: This aim of this project was to predict whether a passenger was satisfied or not considering their overall experience of traveling on the Shinkansen Bullet Train. Currently I have managed to acheive an accuracy of 95%

notebooks.title: Movie Recommendations
notebooks.description: I had a lot of fun working on this project and got to learn a lot of new features with computer vision. and learned basic tensorflow implementations
